projects.title: Barley-Break
projects.description: Classic game written in pure JavaScript on HTML 5 Canvas API.

projects.title: Four in a Row (Connect four)
projects.description: Four in a Row (Connect four) is a two-player connection rack game, in which the players choose a color and then take turns dropping colored tokens into a seven-column, six-row vertically suspended grid. Game written in pure JavaScript on HTML 5 Canvas API.

projects.title: Clock
projects.description: Just a clock using the HTML 5 Canvas transformation.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: This project written in pure JavaScript and CSS 3.

projects.title: Tetris
projects.description: Tetris is a puzzle video game created by Soviet software engineer Alexey Pajitnov in 1984. Game written in pure JavaScript on HTML 5 Canvas API.
